overview:
For the past ten years Emmanuel has immersed himself in the world of online community development. In 1998 he served as the technical producer of one of the first successful French online community. Emmanuel believes in the force of linking technology and ideas to create social interactivity amongst online consumers. His diverse technical background married with his extensive business training provides the ideal platform for mining the potential for brands in online communities. He is the co-founder of Social2U and Le Site. He is the VP of Social Games at Ludia

Emmanuel Delmolyâ€™s Specialties:

  • Business intelligence
  • Social Networks
  • Social Gaming
